0.line1: Do you have a project we can help with?

2.line1: Thank you for the provided details!
2.line2: We will get back to you as soon as possible.

first.title: Cyclorama
first.description: A curved white wall, ideal for creating seamless images and experimenting with light and shadows.
first.usage: Professional photoshoots, music videos, commercial campaigns.

second.title: Modern Living
second.description: A contemporary-style sofa, perfect for elegant photos and relaxed sessions.
second.usage: Editorial photography, stylized portraits, family shoots.

third.title: Vintage
third.description: Two vintage-style sofas that bring class to every photo.
third.usage: Thematic photography, fashion shoots, podcast recordings.

fourth.title: Dining
fourth.description: Designed in a natural style, it brings warmth and authenticity to every image.
fourth.usage: Lifestyle photography, food product commercials, culinary shoots.

service.content: The studio is divided into 4 distinct areas, perfect for photo shoots or available video production. With a pastel aesthetic and modern amenities, every detail is designed to inspire and support.

overlay.screen1: We are a creative and experienced team offering photo-video services, with a personalized approach for every project.
overlay.screen2: We ensure flexibility and effective communication. The studio is conveniently located in Chișinău, Ciocana district.

rules.0:
Studio Access Rules 
 - Access permitted for maximum 6 people (including photographers). 
 - For each additional person, a fee of 100 lei/person is charged. 
 - Access with people not involved in the project is not recommended, except for cases discussed in advance.
rules.1:
Footwear (studio & cyclorama) 
 - Access to the studio is exclusively with clean change shoes, disposable shoe covers, or with adhesive tape applied to the sole. 
 - This rule also applies to the cyclorama area. 
 - Failure to comply with this rule will result in a repainting fee according to the penalty grid.
rules.2:
Use of Space 
 - Leaning against cyclorama walls is strictly forbidden. 
 - Smoking, alcohol consumption, and use of pyrotechnics (sparklers, smoke bombs, etc.) are prohibited inside the studio. 
 - Consumption of food or beverages in the work area is also prohibited.
rules.3:
Behavior & Cleanliness 
 - Maintaining order: It is each client's responsibility to leave the space clean and well-organized, as at the beginning of the session. 
 - Equipment handling: Please treat studio props, furniture, and equipment with care. In case of damage, repair or replacement costs may apply. 
 - Other materials brought in: If you intend to use your own materials (confetti, etc.), please inform the team in advance. The client is responsible for complete cleaning of the space at the end of the session.
rules.4:
Penalties 
 - Dry cleaning of textiles – from 1000 MDL/piece. 
 - Dry cleaning of furniture – from 2000 MDL/piece. 
 - Floor cleaning – from 500 MDL. 
 - Wall cleaning – from 1000 MDL.
rules.5:
Art. 1064 Civil Code of the Republic of Moldova: 
 - Damages to the property of a legal entity or individual must be fully compensated by the person who caused the damage.
rules.6: It is forbidden to appropriate studio property. (Administrative Code of the Republic of Moldova, Art. 20.1)

benefits.2: Bang & Olufsen audio system with AirPlay.
benefits.4: Stands, custom makeup table, clothing rack, large mirror, steamer.
benefits.5: Technical support from our team for any need, from equipment setup to post-production.

projects.subtitle: PORTFOLIO
projects.content: Each project we create tells a unique story, crafted with passion and attention to detail. Our portfolio reflects expertise, innovation, and a commitment to exceeding client expectations.
